item.title: Mirror Controller Shapes Documentation
item.description: Are you tired of manually repositioning asymmetrical components to match control curves on the opposite side in Maya? Look no further! Mirror Controller Shape is here to simplify your workflow and save you time. With just a few clicks, you can effortlessly mirror control shapes across different axes, ensuring symmetry and consistency in your projects.
